<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 276, 230, 292]]<|/det|>
## MATHEMATICS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[832, 277, 905, 292]]<|/det|>
0580/31  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 300, 288, 316]]<|/det|>
Paper 3 Calculator (Core)  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[780, 301, 905, 316]]<|/det|>
May/June 2025  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[752, 325, 905, 341]]<|/det|>
1 hour 30 minutes  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 355, 395, 370]]<|/det|>
You must answer on the question paper.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 384, 400, 400]]<|/det|>
You will need: Geometrical instruments  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 222, 433]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 808, 620]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS- Answer all questions.- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.- Do not write on any bar codes.- You should use a scientific calculator where appropriate.- You may use tracing paper.- You must show all necessary working clearly.- Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question.- For \(\pi\), use either your calculator value or 3.142.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 650, 213, 665]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 666, 730, 698]]<|/det|>
INFORMATION- The total mark for this paper is 80.- The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 121, 368, 139]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of triangle, base \(b\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 114, 680, 141]]<|/det|>
\(A = \frac{1}{2} bh\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 168, 660, 186]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 166, 675, 185]]<|/det|>
\(A = \pi r^2\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 216, 680, 234]]<|/det|>
Circumference, \(C\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 216, 675, 234]]<|/det|>
\(C = 2\pi r\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 263, 680, 282]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 263, 687, 282]]<|/det|>
\(A = 2\pi rh\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 311, 660, 330]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cone of radius \(r\), sloping edge \(l\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 311, 670, 329]]<|/det|>
\(A = \pi rl\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 359, 680, 377]]<|/det|>
Surface area, \(A\), of sphere of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 359, 680, 377]]<|/det|>
\(A = 4\pi r^2\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 408, 662, 427]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of prism, cross-sectional area \(A\), length \(l\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 408, 662, 427]]<|/det|>
\(V = Al\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 454, 680, 481]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of pyramid, base area \(A\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 452, 680, 479]]<|/det|>
\(V = \frac{1}{3} Ah\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 504, 680, 523]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 504, 680, 523]]<|/det|>
\(V = \pi r^2 h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 552, 695, 571]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cone of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 549, 695, 575]]<|/det|>
\(V = \frac{1}{3}\pi r^2 h\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 600, 680, 621]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of sphere of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 598, 685, 623]]<|/det|>
\(V = \frac{4}{3}\pi r^3\)
